link-text: Sometime II: Teddy Roosevelt is a smug little shit: Part 1
link-description:
thewanderinghoodie:

Last week, some time around Wednesday afternoon, I was walking past the line of windows between the lab and the office where my indignant and thus far ignored coffee was waiting for me when a particular looking cloud highlighted with lighting grabbed me by the corner of…
